channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Obama's 'iconic voice' eclipsed in 2025 election by Trump-era economic, affordability complaints

item.title: Boeing won’t face a criminal conspiracy charge over two 737 Max jetliner crashes that killed 346 people
item.description: As part of a deal to drop the charge, the American aerospace company has agreed to pay or invest an additional $1.1 billion in fines.

item.title: Lawmakers revive major, century-old offer to Virginians as Spanberger, Jones set to take office
item.description: West Virginia lawmakers revive century-old offer to welcome Virginia counties after Democratic election sweep, seeking to reunite border communities.

item.title: Jamie Dimon predicts AI will shorten the workweek: ‘My guess is the developed world be working three-and-a-half days a week’
item.description: He thinks it’ll eliminate jobs, but we can steer our way out of disaster.

item.title: Tests showing Chinese-made buses can be stopped remotely prompt Norwegian pullback
item.description: The company said tests, done in underground mines to block signals, used both new Yutong buses and three-year-old models from Dutch maker VDL.

item.title: It Is Time to Be Done with Shutdowns
item.description: We’re five weeks into a government shutdown. It should be the last one.

item.title: Reelected Kansas Mayor Faces Charges Of Voting As Noncitizen
item.description: When registering to vote, the only proof of citizenship is checkmark on a postcard, indicating yes or no, “Are you a U.S. citizen?”

item.title: Trump cuts deal with pharmaceutical companies for lower 'fat drug' prices
item.description: The Trump administration announced a deal Thursday with drugmakers Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk to lower the prices of their obesity drugs.

item.title: A Visit to Sarasota’s Ringling Museum
item.description: It’s both whimsical and serious, though its website is awful. And, Governor DeSantis, don’t mess with its governance.

item.title: The Nationalization of Elections Is Anti-American
